statements: SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE participation = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, course_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE course_id = '111e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND participation = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, course_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_attendance WHERE course_id = 'abc-123' AND participation = true;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-10';
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM student_attendance WHERE participation = false;
SELECT student_id, course_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date, is_present FROM students INNER JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id ORDER BY attendance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance.is_present = true;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE is_present = true;
SELECT student_id, course_id, attendance_date FROM attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.id = attendance.student_id WHERE students.name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT name, email, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC
SELECT students.name, courses.course_name, attendance.attendance_date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.id = attendance.student_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = attendance.course_id
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM attendance
SELECT * FROM student;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT course_name FROM course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date FROM student s JOIN attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id;
SELECT student_name, participation_grade FROM student s JOIN participation p ON s.student_id = p.student_id ORDER BY participation_grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM student ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_id FROM course WHERE course_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_date = '2022-01-10' AND attended = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN course ON attendance.course_id = course.course_id;
SELECT student_name, participation_grade FROM student JOIN participation ON student.student_id = participation.student_id WHERE participation_grade >= 90 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE LENGTH(course_description) > 0;
SELECT enrollment_id, session_date, is_present FROM attendance WHERE is_present = TRUE ORDER BY session_date;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_name, course_name, session_date FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN attendance a ON e.enrollment_id = a.enrollment_id WHERE a.is_present = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participations FROM participation WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
